package.description:
This package include a single node that allows, by saving the pose of a robot e.e. (w.r.t. a base frame) and the the position (only x,y,z) of a marker/feature w.r.t.
a camera frame, to estimate the camera frame (w.r.t. the same base frame) Computation functionalities are available as python stand-alone code.
package.author: Gianni Borghesan, gianni.borghesan@mech.kuleuven.be
